summary: Good-looking middle-class boy, arrested because of a minor offense (a fight in a bar), is put in a fetid small cell with six dangerous and poor criminals, and ends up being brutally raped.
cast: Paulo César Peréio|Cláudio Mamberti|Marcos Palmeira|Chico Díaz|Cosme dos Santos|Roberto Bomtempo|Marcos Winter|Antonio Pitanga|Elisa Lucinda|David Pinheiro
title: Barrela: Escola de Crimes
